div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1088 Cherronesus environs (near mod. Se- vastopol'), Crimea Oblast, Ukraine, 1953 Burial: c. mid 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 38+ AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: AE (as BMC 7, 5 magistrates) Disposition: Sevastopol' 38 Gilevich, SA 28 (1958), pp. 136-9
